name: Parallel ( DEMO )
description:
This game is just a Demo and I made this game just for fun so enjoy my Game.  I'm gonna still add some content to the near future cause I like making games and express my story through this way. PLEASE LEAVE ANY REPORT OR SUGGESTION TO THIS GAME SO I CAN IMPROVE IT. THANK YOU VERY MUCH <3

Summary:

You are just a regular person with a regular life,  Living this way is pretty much decent since everyone has a different lifestyle. But one day you wake to this beautiful place that there where no tall structures,  air pollution, litter, and so much more that can kill the environment. But it's strangely that you forget everything and everyone, It's beautiful but you still need answer. That's why you "Traveler" will explore this fantasy world and make some legacy.
